title: Alternative protein sources from selected legumes and mushrooms in the development of high-protein instant soup for the elderly
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Rajnibhas Sukeaw Samakradhamrongthai, Taruedee Jannu, Tussanun Tongboonchu, Wanalee Sangpimpa, Phatthamon Srichan, Orapan Sangsee, Gerry Renaldi, Preeyabhorn Detarun
